## YootState type

Represents the state of a Yoot object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type YootState = {
  src?: string;
  alt?: string;
  width?: number;
  height?: number;
  directives: Directives;
};
```

**References:** [Directives](./yoot.directives.md)

## Remarks

Suitable for `toJSON()` output.
